worldDetails: This is world number $[1] with a seed of '$[2]'
uptimeAll: $[1] has been live for $[2] this year!
currentSong: The current song playing is '$[1]' by '$[2]'. Check them out at $[3]
newSeed: Let's get a new seed. Type !seed (seed name) to suggest a seed. For example to suggest a seed of Example Seed use !seed Example Seed
seedAdded: One or more seeds have been added to the list!
seedPickNone: There was no winner as no seeds were submitted!
seedPick: The winner was $[1] with a seed of '$[2]'
doucheWarning: Stop being a douche $[1]! Read the rules and come back later, this is your first and final warning! [Timed out] [10 minutes]
douche: WOW! You're such a douche $[1]! Read the rules and come back another day as you've already been warned! [Timed out] [12 hours]
eyetimeNone: The user $[1] has not been in the channel before!
eyetime: The user $[1] has been in the channel for $[2] while the streamer has been online for $[3] which means they've been here for $[4]% of the streams!
highlight: The time $[1] has been saved to be highlighted after the stream!
linkTimeoutsOn: Link timeouts have been turned on!
linkTimeoutsOff: Link timeouts have been turned off!
permit: $[1] has been permitted to post links for $[2]!
raid: Head on over to $[1] who is playing '$[2]' and write the message '$[3]' once and only once and sit back and enjoy the stream :)
raidMessage: An Allmighty raid has come your way!
linkTimeoutMessage: Please ask permission before posting links! [Timed out] [$[1]]
